name: Findings and advisory opinion
text:
(a)  The panel shall prepare findings and an advisory opinion concerning the probable merits of a claim, probable award of compensation, or recommended corrective action by the State.
	(b)  The findings and advisory opinion shall be signed by all members of the panel; provided that any member of the panel may file a written concurring or dissenting advisory opinion.
	(c)  The advisory opinion of the panel rendered on each claim shall be incorporated in the reports required by section 674-14 for submission to the legislature. [L 1991, c 323, pt of §1; am L 1993, c 351, §7]
